Detailed Description

This class writes a DataSet data. The DataSet data is written to the file using memory-mapping. This class assumes that the DataSetHeaderWriter has already written the DataSetHeader to the file or more accurately, that the file has already been created by the GenericFileWriter.

bool MMDataSetDataWriter::Open (  ) 

Opens the writer. It closes the previously opened view and opens a memory-mapped view of the first section of the DataSet.

Returns:
true if it succeeded. Method may also throw exceptions.
